<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disarming Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=5836) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You attack with enough force to knock the weapon out of your foe's hands. Make a melee Strike; if you hit, you can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) that enemy.
name: Disarming Assault
